title: Lore
desc: About this world you're about to enter...

title: Meta
desc: Who will be affected by the choices made here and their knowledge about it?

title: Difficulty
desc:
How many points will you be granted by scenarios and drawbacks?
Has no impact otherwise.

title: Scenario
desc: At what point will you arrive?

title: Perks
desc: Unique abilities provided by this CYOA and not your Shard.

title: Drawbacks
desc: Unique effects created by this CYOA (and not your Shard) that hinder you in some way.
